articles.description: Check out the mortgage rates for June 11, 2021, which are unchanged from yesterday.
articles.content:
Based on data compiled by Credible, mortgage rates remained unchanged since yesterday.
  • 30-year fixed mortgage rates: 2.750%, Unchanged
  • 20-year fixed mortgage rates: 2.625%, Unchanged… [+7908 chars]

articles.title: Rare 'Alien' CryptoPunk fetches $11.8 million in Sotheby's auction - The Block Crypto
articles.description: The event was part of the auction house’s “Natively Digital” curated NFT sale, which featured 27 other pieces and a virtual gallery.
articles.content:
A rare CryptoPunk has sold for a record-breaking $11.8 million in an auction hosted by popular auction house, Sothebys. 
The non-fungible token (NFT) was sold to Shalom Meckenzie, the largest shareh… [+3285 chars]
